price: 6. Nubuwwannuu kee Qilmil yoo nagraah yaq-qhuub Samadak Qilmii kee nubuwwannu nagra baxa yoh acuwaay atu kicintooh ku-naqoosa kicna baxa yoh kaa ab iyye.
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
